title: What singular technology would solve most of the world's problems? - Quora

response.answer_text: We’re saying ‘would’ here so I’m guessing it can be something that doesn’t yet exist. Therefore I nominate… Transporters of Star Trek Think about it! Not only have you solved all transportation issues immediately (provided you don’t mind the theological death bit) but you also have unlimited food! You can take matter (or even energy apparently?) and reform it into any shape you like. That includes new food, clothes, vehicles but also taking old non-disposable items like plastic bags, tires and nuclear waste. Oh, also there’d be a cure for all diseases because you could literally rewrite people at the molecular level. As a cheeky bonus immortality, because why not transpose someone’s brain state into a body with all it’s cells repaired. Both from age and traumatic death. Now that would be something to behold!  How to f*ck up the peril factor of your TV show 101

Some process that can destroy plastic before it clogs up the rivers and oceans destroying all marine life Greedy supermarkets think they have solved this by charging 10p for plastic bags. They qualify this by saying the 10p goes to so called good causes. In the U.K. councils have admitted 60% of plastic we ‘recycle’ still goes to landfill….they are fighting a losing battle to cope Only a complete ban will solve this problem and anyway biodegradable paper bags have been around for a very long time Sadly, plastic is mainly a by-product of oil which is something else we need to become less dependent upon

Achieving Artificial Super Intelligence (that would help us and not eliminate us) would be the most useful creation that can be achieved through technology as it would be able to solve many problems with high efficiency and at a much faster pace than any human ever. So the ASI would essentially act as a tool to solve the difficult problems for us.

Duplicator, We Can Duplicate Food, Water, Cars, Money, All Problems Will be solved, We can Send Lots Of Food To Starving People, And Duplicate Homes For Homeless, Make More Hospitals And Not Be Scared Of Losing Money.
Graphene. It could be the new plastic, battery, kevlar, everything
